items.label: 56be50f05457a332548b456e
items.name: Residential Time-of-Day Bundled (RS-TOD)
items.description: Available for residential service through one single-phase multiple-register meter capable of measuring electrical energy consumption during the on-peak and off-peak billing periods to individual residential customers.On-peak billing period is defined as 7 a.m. to 9 p.m  Monday through Friday. The off-peak billing period is defined as 9 p.m. to 7 a.m. for all weekdays, all hours of the day on Saturdays and Sundays.
items.basicinformationcomments: Monthly charge includes gridSMART Phase 1 Rider
items.energycomments:
The Monthly charge includes the gridSMART Rider.   
Adjustments = Universal Service Fund rider + kWh tax rider + Pilot Throughput Balancing Adjustment rider + Deferred Asset Phase-In rider + Generation Energy rider + Generation Capacity rider + Auction Cost Reconciliation rider + Basic Transmission Cost rider + Transmission Cost Recovery rider + Transmission Under-Recovery rider + Energy Efficiency and Peak Demand Reduction Cost Recovery rider + Economic Development Cost Recovery rider + Enhanced Service Availability rider + Distribution Investment rider + Alternative Energy rider + Phase-In Recovery rider.
